special_powers.name: MINION: LEARNING THE ROPES
special_powers.description: When a friendly character with the Police keyword and a higher point value is within 8 squares, modify GCPD Officer's attack value by +1. If that character is named Commissioner Gordon, modify his speed and damage values by +1 as well.

special_powers.name: MINION: REMEMBER YOUR BASIC TRAINING
special_powers.description: When a friendly character with the Police keyword and a higher point value is within 8 squares, GCPD Officer can use Leap/Climb and Willpower.

special_powers.name: JET JOCKEY
special_powers.description: When Lady Blackhawk is the pilot of a vehicle with the "wing" speed symbol, modify its speed value by +2 and its attack value by +1.

special_powers.name: CANARY CRY
special_powers.description: Black Canary can use Incapacitate.  When she uses it to make a close combat attack, modify her attack value by +2 and all adjacent opposing characters are targeted.

special_powers.name: ON THE CASE
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, choose a team ability or keyword possessed by an opposing character; GCPD Detective can use Outwit, but can only target characters with the chosen keyword or team ability.

special_powers.name: INTERNAL AFFAIRS
special_powers.description: GCPD Detective can use Perplex, but may only target characters that share a keyword with her and can't modify damage values.

special_powers.name: COVER FIRE
special_powers.description: GCPD Sergeant can use Toughness. When GCPD Sergeant is adjacent to a friendly character with the Police team ability, modify both characters' defense values by +1 if not already modified by this effect.

special_powers.name: GROUP ORGANIZER
special_powers.description: GCPD Sergeant can use Leadership and Perplex. When he uses Leadership, all friendly characters with the Police team ability are considered to have a lower point value.

special_powers.name: BEETLE'S BUG
special_powers.description: When Blue Beetle pilots a vehicle named The Bug, modify the vehicle's speed and attack values by +1.

special_powers.name: BB GUN
special_powers.description: Blue Beetle's ranged combat attacks cause knock back, but the target reduces knockback damage by 1.  If the result of the attack roll was doubles, double the number of squares the character is knocked back.

special_powers.name: GUNSEL
special_powers.description: False Facer can use Probability Control, but may only reroll his own ranged combat attacks.

special_powers.name: MINION: THUGS WITH PURPOSE
special_powers.description: When a friendly character named Black Mask is within 8 squares False Facer can use Poison.

special_powers.name: FAST FRIENDS
special_powers.description: When Fire carries a character named Ice that has no action tokens, Ice may be given a non-free action this turn.

special_powers.name: FIERY FORM
special_powers.description: When Fire takes damage from a close combat attack, the attacker is dealt 1 unavoidable damage.

special_powers.name: USE YOUR STRENGTH AGAINST YOU
special_powers.description: When Dove makes a close combat attack, replace her damage value with the printed damage value of her target.

special_powers.name: AGILE DEFENDER
special_powers.description: Dove can use Defend and Super Senses.

special_powers.name: STRIKE FROM THE SHADOWS
special_powers.description: When a friendly character misses an opposing character adjacent to Black Glove Demon, after actions resolve, you may give Black Glove Demon a free action to make a close combat attack targeting the same opposing character.

special_powers.name: WE ARE LEGION, UNSTOPPABLE
special_powers.description: At the end of your turn, you may place Black Glove Demon in an adjacent square.

special_powers.name: THE HOLE IN THINGS
special_powers.description: Dr. Hurt can use Mind Control. When a friendly character adjacent to Dr. Hurt makes an attack roll that misses and the roll was doubles, remove an action token from a friendly character that is not the attacker.

special_powers.name: THE ULTIMATE FOE
special_powers.description: Dr. Hurt can use Outwit, Shape Change, and Support.

special_powers.name: SOMEDAY HE MIGHT BE BETTER THAN ME
special_powers.description: Robin can use Perplex.

special_powers.name: I HAVE MISSIONS FOR ALL OF MY ALLIES
special_powers.description: Batman can use Leadership and Perplex, when he uses Perplex, he can only target friendly characters possessing the same team ability or keyword as Batman.

special_powers.name: JETSUIT
special_powers.description: Batman can use Charge and the Flight ability.

special_powers.name: KNEECAPPING ISN'T KILLING
special_powers.description: Huntress can use Close Combat Expert.  When Huntress hits a target with a ranged combat attack, modify the target's speed value by -2 until the beginning of your next turn.

special_powers.name: PARTNERS
special_powers.description: When a friendly character named Harvey Bullock is adjacent to Renee Montoya, they both modify their attack values by +1 if not already modified by this effect.

special_powers.name: ALTER EGO:THE QUESTION
special_powers.description: Give Renee Montoya a power action that deals no pushing damage and replace her with a SOG #015b The Question on its orange starting line. This power can't be countered.

special_powers.name: DIVIDE THE ENFORCERS FROM THE BOSSES
special_powers.description: Opposing characters within 6 squares can't use Leadership or the Carry ability.

special_powers.name: ASKING QUESTIONS
special_powers.description: The Question does not possess the Police team ability.  At the beginning of your turn, the Question can use Smoke Cloud as a free action, but can only place 1 hindering terrain marker.

special_powers.name: LEMME SHOW YOU HOW WE STAKEOUT
special_powers.description: Harvey Bullock and adjacent friendly characters who possess a keyword or team ability in common with him can use Stealth.

special_powers.name: I WANT THE BIG FISH
special_powers.description: Opposing characters within 6 squares and line of fire can't use Mastermind or Shape Change.

special_powers.name: UNLIKELY COUPLE
special_powers.description: When a friendly character named Guy Gardner is adjacent to Ice they both modify their attack values by +1 if not already modified by this effect.

special_powers.name: BULLSEYE
special_powers.description: When Red Hood makes a successful ranged combat attack and either die is a 6, the damage dealt is penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: GUNS BLAZING
special_powers.description: When making a ranged combat attack, modify Red Hood's attack value by +1 for each target.

special_powers.name: ODD DAYS...AND EVEN
special_powers.description: Calendar Man can use Stealth.  When the game begins on a day with an even-numbered day of the month: Give Calendar Man a power action; halve the speed value and range value of a target opposing character until the beginning of your next turn.  When the game begins on a day with an odd-numbered day of the month: Give Calendar Man a power action; up to three friendly characters adjacent to him can use Phasing/Teleport until the beginning of your next turn.

special_powers.name: WEEKEND WARRIORS
special_powers.description: Calendar Man can use Energy Explosion.  When the game begins on Monday through Thursday, Calendar Man can use Outwit; when he counters an ability he counteres that ability on all opposing characters.  When the game begins on Friday through Sunday: modify the attack value of friendly characters adjacent to Calendar Man by +1.

special_powers.name: CELEBRATING HOLIDAYS WITH A BANG
special_powers.description: Calendar Man can use Probability Control.  Give Calendar Man a power action and roll a d6.  When the battle begins during the winter or spring, on a result of 5-6 give an action token to an opposing character within 10 squares and adjacent to or holding an object.  When the battle begins during the summer or fall, on a result of 5-6, deal 1 penetrating damage to an opposing character within 10 squares and adjacent to or holding an object.

special_powers.name: CHOMP
special_powers.description: Killer Croc can use Blades/Claws/Fangs and Super Strength. When he uses Blades/Claws/Fangs and the d6 result is 3 or less, damage from the attack is penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: MORPH: HORRIFIC TRANSFORMATION
special_powers.description: When Harvey Dent takes 2 or more damage from an attack, roll a d6. On a result of 4-6, you may replace this character with BM #022 Two-Face on the same click number.

special_powers.name: CLEANING UP THE STREETS
special_powers.description: Harvey Dent can use Defend and Toughness. When he uses Defend, adjacent characters with a point value less than 50 also modify their defense values by +1.

special_powers.name: FEAR GAS
special_powers.description: At the end of your turn, Scarecrow can use Smoke Cloud as a free action. Adjacent friendly characters occupying a hindering terrain token placed by Scarecrow's Smoke Cloud are considered to have a lower point value when Scarecrow uses Mastermind.

special_powers.name: MANIAPHOBIA
special_powers.description: Scarecrow can use Incapacitate as if he had 3 targets. When he does, instead of giving each hit target an action token, he may instead deal penetrating damage to the target(s) equal to the number of action tokens on each target.

special_powers.name: COUNTING COUP
special_powers.description: Each time Mr. Zsasz damages an opposing character, place a tally token on Mr. Zsasz's card. When he makes an attack, you may remove one tally token to modify his damage value by +1 or remove two tally tokens to have damage dealt from the attack be penetrating.

special_powers.name: ON ME, OFFICERS!
special_powers.description: Commissioner Gordon can use Enhancement and Running Shot. Give a friendly character with the Police keyword a power action to move up to half of their speed value. If you do and they end their move adjacent to Commissioner Gordon, you may give that character a ranged combat action as a free action.

special_powers.name: I CARRY THIS TEAM
special_powers.description: When Guy Gardner is adjacent to a character with whom he shares a keyword, unless they have already been modified by this effect, modify Guy Gardner's damage value by +1 and the adjacent character's defense value by +1.

special_powers.name: TWO-FISTED CHARGE
special_powers.description: Guy Gardner can use Charge and Flurry; when he uses Flurry to attack the same character twice, damage dealt by the second attack is penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: BUSTING HEADS
special_powers.description: Guy Gardner can use Exploit Weakness and possesses Battle Fury.

special_powers.name: TANTU TOTEM
special_powers.description: Give Vixen a free action and she can use any one standard power possessed by any one character on the battlefield with the Animal keyword until your next turn and as long as that character possesses the power. When she does, at the beginning of her next turn, roll a d6 and on a result of 1 deal Vixen 1 unavoidable damage.

special_powers.name: I PROTECT MY KEY MEN
special_powers.description: When Black Mask is adjacent to a friendly character that is being dealt damage through Mastermind, you may give action tokens to that character, if you do, reduce the transferred damage by 1 for each action token given.

special_powers.name: HANDLE THIS MYSELF
special_powers.description: Black Mask can use Close Combat Expert.

special_powers.name: IT'S TIME CRIMINALS WALKED IN THE LIGHT
special_powers.description: Black Mask can use Outwit. He can also use Perplex, but he can only target friendly characters.

special_powers.name: BRINGING DOWN GOTHAM
special_powers.description: Give the Architect a close combat action and target a wall or square of blocking terrain; the targeted terrain is destroyed as well as an adjacent square of blocking terrain.

special_powers.name: IT'S NECESSARY FOR THE WORLD TO BE AFRAID OF US
special_powers.description: When Batman rolls doubles (except a critical miss) and misses, if the target has one action token, it is a hit instead of a miss.

special_powers.name: LASSO OF TRUTH
special_powers.description: Wonder Woman can use Incapacitate as if she had a range of 6.  When she does, hit characters can't have their combat values modified until your next turn.

special_powers.name: BULLETS AND BRACELETS
special_powers.description: Wonder Woman can use Toughness; she can use Defend if an adjacent friendly character is the target of a ranged attack.

special_powers.name: QUANTUM TRANSPORTER
special_powers.description: When Void uses the Carry ability, she can carry up to four friendly characters. After Void resolves a move action, she may immediately use Support as a free action.

special_powers.name: PRECOGNITION
special_powers.description: Void can use Outwit, Probability Control, and Super Senses; when an action resolves after she uses any of these powers, roll a d6 that cannot be rerolled and on a result of 'one' deal Void 1 unavoidable damage.

special_powers.name: ANDROID SOLDIER
special_powers.description: Spartan Warrior Spirit can use Super Strength.

special_powers.name: TACTICAL SYSTEMS
special_powers.description: Spartan Warrior Spirit can use Leadership. He can also use Perplex, but can only modify his own combat values.

special_powers.name: IMMORTAL
special_powers.description: Emp can use Invulnerability and Regeneration. When turning the dial, if this click is revealed due to damage taken from and opponent's attack, stop turning the dial. This power can't be ignored.

special_powers.name: HIGH LORD
special_powers.description: Emp can use Outwit and Perplex. When he uses Perplex, he can only target opposing characters.

special_powers.name: DEADLY MENTOR
special_powers.description: As you reveal your force, choose a friendly character with a lower point value; David Cain can use Enhancement, Leadership, and Perplex, but he can only affect the chosen character. David Cain can use Shape Change when he is adjacent to the chosen character.

special_powers.name: THE LEOPARD BLOW-A WARRIOR'S DEATH
special_powers.description: Lady Shiva can use Flurry. When she does and the result of the attack roll is doubles, damage dealt by the attack is penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: ATTACK FROM COVER
special_powers.description: Deathstroke can use Stealth; when he occupies hindering terrain, he can use Charge and Running Shot.

special_powers.name: ON THE RUN TOGETHER
special_powers.description: When Black Canary is adjacent to a friendly figure with which she shares a keyword, modify her attack and defense values by +1.

special_powers.name: SPINNING KICK
special_powers.description: Black Canary can use Charge and Flurry.

special_powers.name: I'LL DRIVE US STRAIGHT THROUGH THAT WALL
special_powers.description: Starling can use the Carry ability. When Starling moves, she may ignore the effects of one object or one square of blocking terrain for movement purposes. If she does, after she completes her move, destroy the object of square of terrain.

special_powers.name: SWEEPING SLASH
special_powers.description: Katana can use Quake. When she does, roll a d6, subtract 2 (minimum 2) and hit characters are dealt the result instead of 2. This attack does not knock back characters.

special_powers.name: LIVING STELLAR FLAME
special_powers.description: Starfire can use Energy Explosion; when she does, damage dealt is penetrating.

special_powers.name: JUST PUT A BOW IN MY HANDS
special_powers.description: When Arsenal makes a ranged combat attack, he may modify his attack value by +2 or he may modify both his attack and damage values by +1.

special_powers.name: TIME BOMB ARROW
special_powers.description: Arsenal can use Incapacitate.  When he does, choose a hit character.  At the beginning of your next turn, roll a d6; on a result of 5-6, deal that character 1 damage.

special_powers.name: NO ONE RIDES BUT ME
special_powers.description: When Batman becomes the pilot for SoG #V001 Batcycle, the vehicle may be given a non free action this turn.

special_powers.name: I BRING THE DARKNESS
special_powers.description: When Batman passes through a square containing an opposing character during a move action, after actions resolve he may use Smoke Cloud as a free action but must place the first token in the square occupied by the opposing character.

special_powers.name: ROLLING STRIKE
special_powers.description: Batman can use Charge and Running Shot. When he uses Charge, after actions resolve he may be given a move action with his speed value halved as a free action.

special_powers.name: SNAG AND DRAG
special_powers.description: When Robin uses Incapacitate and hits, after actions resolve, Robin automatically breaks away and may move 4 squares as a free action and then places the hit character in an adjacent square.

special_powers.name: THAT'S MY BIKE!
special_powers.description: When Robin becomes the pilot for SoG #V002 Robincycle, the vehicle may be given a non-free action this turn.

special_powers.name: ROAD TO DETECTIVE
special_powers.description: The combat values of opposing characters adjacent to Robin cannot be modified if the modification would increase the value.

special_powers.name: SPECIAL TRAINING
special_powers.description: When GCPD Motor Officer becomes the pilot for SoG #V003 GCPD Motorcycle, the vehicle may be given a non-free action this turn.

special_powers.name: APB
special_powers.description: When GCPD Motor Officer makes a ranged attack, after actions resolve, modify the defense value of the target by -1 until the end of your turn.

special_powers.name: GHOSTS OF BATMAN
special_powers.description: Once per game for all characters with this trait, choose an opposing character. When Batman attacks the chosen character, modify his attack value by +1 for each other friendly character with this trait.

special_powers.name: GHOSTS OF BATMAN
special_powers.description: Once per game for all characters with this trait, choose an opposing character. When Batman attacks the chosen character, modify his attack value by +1 for each other friendly character with this trait.

special_powers.name: ALPHA MALE
special_powers.description: When Batman is adjacent to a friendly character with a shared keyword, that character can't be attacked if Batman can be attacked instead.

special_powers.name: VENOM ADDICT
special_powers.description: Batman can use Flurry. When he does, modify his attack and damage values by +1 for the second attack if he attacks the same target as the first attack.

special_powers.name: GHOSTS OF BATMAN
special_powers.description: Once per game for all characters with this trait, choose an opposing character. When Batman attacks the chosen character, modify his attack value by +1 for each other friendly character with this trait.

special_powers.name: BURN
special_powers.description: Batman can use Energy Explosion, when he does, damage dealt is penetrating.

special_powers.name: HOSTAGE SOULS
special_powers.description: Batman can use Super Senses. Modify Batman's defense value by +1 when he is adjacent to an opposing character marked with an action token.

special_powers.name: I MADE THIS CITY A WEAPON
special_powers.description: Batman can use Outwit. Give Batman a free action and choose an unheld object within 10 squares; deal all opposing characters occupying or adjacent to the same square as the object 1 damage, then remove the object from the game.

special_powers.name: POST-HYPNOTIC SUGGESTION
special_powers.description: Hugo Strange can use Mind Control.  When he does, modify his attack value by +1 if the target is marked with an action token; if the target has an action token and is adjacent, modify his attack value by an additional +1.

special_powers.name: INSPIRATION
special_powers.description: Adjacent friendly characters can use Willpower.

special_powers.name: CONTROLLING THE FLOW OF COMBAT
special_powers.description: When using the Duo Attack ability, Batman and Nightwing may use Charge or Smoke Cloud as a free action instead of making the second attack.

Give a character adjacent to this object a power action and choose another friendly character that is not within 8 squares of this object. Place the chosen character adjacent to this character and this object.
This character is a wild card, but can use opposing team abilities instead of friendly team abilities.

special_powers.name: TRAILING DARKNESS
special_powers.description: Batcycle can use Smoke Cloud as a free action immediately after the resolution of an action in which it moved, but the first hindering terrain marker must be placed in a square moved through by Batcycle this turn.

special_powers.name: PILOT ABILITY: FAMILIAR CONTROLS
special_powers.description: Prerequisites: Batman Ally team ability or Batman Family keyword.  Batcycle can use Stealth and Outwit.

special_powers.name: PILOT ABILITY: HELPED REBUILD IT
special_powers.description: Prerequisites: Alfred Pennyworth, Batgirl, Batman, Batwoman, Bruce Wayne, Robin or Nightwing.  Batcycle modifies its attack and defense values by +1.

special_powers.name: TRAILING DARKNESS
special_powers.description: Batcycle can use Smoke Cloud as a free action immediately after the resolution of an action in which it moved, but the first hindering terrain marker must be placed in a square moved through by Batcycle this turn.

special_powers.name: PILOT ABILITY: BATCOMPUTER-ASSISTED TARGET DETECTI
special_powers.description: Prerequisites: Batman Ally team ability or Titans team ability.  Robincycle can use Enhancement. It can also use Perplex, but it can only modify its own attack and range values.

special_powers.name: PILOT ABILITY: TEAR GAS CANISTERS
special_powers.description: Prerequisites: Batgirl, Nightwing, Red Robin, or Robin.  Robincycle can use Incapacitate. When it uses Incapacitate, if the attack hits and the result of the attack roll is doubles, you may also place an action token on 1 opposing character adjacent to the target.

special_powers.name: PILOT ABILITY: STAY ON TARGET
special_powers.description: Prerequisites: Police team ability or Police keyword. Once per turn, when a friendly character adjacent to GCPD Motorcycle rolls an attack and misses but the attack roll is doubles (other than a critical miss), you may reroll the attack roll. After the attack resolves, deal GCPD Motorcycle 1 unavoidable damage.

special_powers.name: PILOT ABILITY: CALL FOR BACKUP
special_powers.description: Prerequisites: Any character with "GCPD" or "Gordon" in its name.  Give GCPD Motorcycle a power action and roll 2d6. Any number of friendly characters with the Police team ability may immediately be given move actions as free actions as long as 1) all moved characters end their move adjacent to GCPD Motorcycle, and 2) the combined total number of squares the characters move does not exceed the total rolled by GCPD Motorcycle.

Orange squares are Manhole squares. If you are also playing with the Killer Croc Sewer Lair map, you may give a character occupying this square a power action and place that character in the corresponding square on that map. If that square is occupied, place that character in the nearest square it could be placed in.

Orange squares are Manhole squares. If you are also playing with the Streets of Gotham City map, you may give a character occupying this square a power action and place that character in the corresponding square on that map. If that square is occupied, place that character in the nearest square it could be placed in.
